touch 0.1.5
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

touch 0.1-5 Unreleased

Minor changes

  • Added indication for converting ICD codes with positive combination flags.

touch 0.1-4 2018-10-14

New features

  • Added fast implementation of the mapping tools developed by AHRQ for translating ICD-9 (resp. ICD-10) codes to ICD-10 (resp. ICD-9) codes based on the General Equivalence Mappings (GEM) from the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS).

touch 0.1-3 2016-12-17

New features

  • The first version of package that provides functions for mapping ICD-9 codes to the AHRQ comorbidity measures.

Developed by Wenjie Wang, Yan Li, Jun Yan.
